adm:managed-object.name: smtp-alert-handler
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
may be used to send e-mail messages to notify administrators of significant events that occur within the server.

adm:property.name: sender-address
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the e-mail address to use as the sender for messages generated by this alert handler.

adm:property.name: recipient-address
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies an e-mail address to which the messages should be sent. Multiple values may be provided if there should be more than one recipient.

adm:property.name: message-subject
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the subject that should be used for e-mail messages generated by this alert handler. The token "%%alert-type%%" will be dynamically replaced with the alert type string. The token "%%alert-id%%" will be dynamically replaced with the alert ID value. The token "%%alert-message%%" will be dynamically replaced with the alert message. The token "\n" will be replaced with an end-of-line marker.

adm:property.name: message-body
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the body that should be used for e-mail messages generated by this alert handler. The token "%%alert-type%%" will be dynamically replaced with the alert type string. The token "%%alert-id%%" will be dynamically replaced with the alert ID value. The token "%%alert-message%%" will be dynamically replaced with the alert message. The token "\n" will be replaced with an end-of-line marker.
